Overview Notes: Take a holiday! Try to incorporate more gentle exercise like yoga and walking. Consider meditation or breathing exercises.
Comment Key: ClinicalExamComment
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Nurse: Lebo Cindi
Clinical Recommendations: 
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear
Overview Notes: Decrease euthyrox to 100ug daily
Comment Key: ClinicalExamComment
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Clinical Recommendations: The thyroidectomy scar was noted on your neck. The rest of the clinical examination was normal.
Men's Health Recommendations:

Overview Notes: Family history, fair amount of alcohol

Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Comment Key: ClinicalExamComment
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Overview Notes: Family history, fair amount of alcohol
Comment Key: LabTestRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Comment Key: LifestyleNote
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis
------------------------------

The only abnormal result was your low TSH indicating that your euthyrox dose is a bit too high. Clinical Recommendations: The thyroidectomy scar was noted on your neck. The rest of the clinical examination was normal.
Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear
Overview Notes: Take a holiday! Try to incorporate more gentle exercise like yoga and walking. Consider meditation or breathing exercises.
Comment Key: MedicalHistoryRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Comment Key: MentalHealthAnxietyRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Comment Key: MentalHealthMoodRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear
Overview Notes: Take a holiday! Try to incorporate more gentle exercise like yoga and walking. Consider meditation or breathing exercises.
Comment Key: SpecialInvestigationNote
Comment Value: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Comment Key: VitalsRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Men's Health Recommendations:

Overview Notes: 0
Comment Key: VitaminsOrSupplements

Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis

Special Investigation Notes: Stress ECG and lung functions not done. Does see her pulmonologist once a year for lung functions due to history of sarcoidosis
